
snap(-6,-6,-6)

sky(0,0,0)
fog(0,0,0)
ground(1000,1000,1000)

fadefrom(8000)

name(Dragrace Of Death)

nlaps(1)

set(27,0,1000000,0)

maxr(63,1000,0)
maxl(63,-1000,0)
maxt(1,300001,0)
maxb(1,-1001,0)

chk(40,0,300000,0)

chk(40,0,-1000,0)
set(10,0,0,0)p
